column5: Hi everyone, I invite you to check out my hardwater album, on my Facebook page from this past winter so far. Many great catches(and releases). Just thought I'd post something to look at while you are all getting ready for open water season. Ice conditions are still good here on the big lakes, and the snow is dropping fast! Walleye still open until this Friday! Last year I was in a boat at this time.http://www.facebook.com/album.php?fb...5440&aid=50903
very nice fish pics, thanks fore sharing them
Nice fish Colin, see you at Neepawa Island week of June 11 !!!

Thanks, I will make it over to put you guys on some great spots! At that time of year, I could almost expect one of your group to pull in a monster Lake Trout while fishing walleye. Please vote for my pic, if you get a chance.....http://www.worldfishingnetwork.com/c...?entryid=85080
Colin, a huge laker would be great !!! I'll place my vote.......Let us know when the ice finally melts.
